welcome_message_body: Welcome to Englewood, the charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant art scene, and friendly locals. We are excited to have you here and hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that Englewood has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Arapahoe Co Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Jeffco Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Denver International Airport, housing check-in counters, security checkpoints, and baggage claim areas.

terminals.name: A Gates
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: B Gates
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: C Gates
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.
